enchantment.minecraft.channeling.desc: Allows the trident to summon lightning bolts during rain.
enchantment.minecraft.impaling.desc: Increases damage to aquatic mobs and entities that are touching water.
enchantment.minecraft.infinity.desc: Allows the bow to fire normal arrows for free.
enchantment.minecraft.thorns.desc: Causes damage to enemies when they attack you within a short distance.
